verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Your grace is enough newline More than I need newline At your word I will believe newline I wait for you newline Draw near again newline Let your spirit make me new

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I will fall at your feet newline I will fall at your feet newline And I will worship You here

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Your presence in me newline Jesus light the way newline By the power of Your word newline I am restored newline Iam redeemed newline By Your spirit I am free

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Freely You gave it all for us newline Surrendered Your life upon that cross newline Great is the love newline Poured out for all newline This is our God newline Lifted on high from death to life newline Forever our God is glorified newline Servant and King newline Rescued the word newline This is our God
